name: Dragons of Fire and Ice
description:
Save the princess who has been trapped in a cage deep within the dragons' lair. Catch the ice cubes with your shield and use them to hit the fire dragon. Try to bounce the fireballs up at the ice dragon. If you can defeat them, then you will free the princess and win the day. 

This game was created in 7 days as a project for me and my 3 sons (7,6,5 years old) for the Level Up Game Jam. I am very proud of my boys and I think they did a great job. I hope you enjoy their first game.
